title: Buy Back CREAM
body:
## Summary

This proposal suggests buying back CREAM with protocol reserve of Cream Swap (approx. $24,933 in USD). This is one of the efficient and fair way to distribute protocol gains among CREAM hodler.

**For**: Buy back CREAM and burn
**Against**: Do nothing

## Specification

Cream Swap swap fee is set at 0.025%, and all the swap fees go to protocol reserve. At the time of drafting this proposal, the total reserve from swap fee is $24,933 (approx. in USD) 

You can see the v1 reserve pool contract [here](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6d5a7597896a703fe8c85775b23395a48f971305).

- USDC: $4,587
- yUSD: $4,274
- cyUSD: $2,572
- crYYCRV: $2,114
- wETH: $1,893
- UNI: $1,711
- crYETH: $1,000
- FARM: $63

You can see the v2 reserve pool contract here. [SWAG/USDC](https://etherscan.io/address/0x69c2fe4f5dfa40dd6d09fadd0681f9364a1aada0), [SWAG/CREAM](https://etherscan.io/address/0x73be65b1800c2ada9592e17c22c1bccc1481bc95) and [SWAG/CREAM 80/20](https://etherscan.io/address/0x6c19e4cc4c87adb224697a1022f262b424f44d46)

- SWAG: $5,675
- USDC: $1,040
- CREAM: $4

The plan is to buy back CREAM with the reserve and send those CREAM tokens to 0xDEAD.
author: 0xb6e362900B7113F246A7e1c17E9746b3B9C079dB
